price: 24. Waxaana ka yeellay qaar ka mid ah (ilmahii Israa’iil) hoggaamiyaal wax ku hanuuniya Amarkayaga, markay samreen8, waxayna ahaayeen kuwo yaqiinsan Aayadahayaga.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا لَمَّا صَبَرُواْۖ وَكَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يُوقِنُونَ
footnotes: 8. Markay ku samreen oogidda Xaqa iyo ku dhaqanki.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā min'hum a-immatan yahdūna bi-amrinā lammā ṣabarū wakānū biāyātinā yūqinūna
